title: Konnex raises funding to advance robotics-as-a-service offering
description:
Konnex has raised funding to offer robotics and AI that it says can be deployed and scaled as decentralized labor like software as a service.

The post Konnex raises funding to advance robotics-as-a-service offering appeared first on The Robot Report.
